sentences.en: Cat's foreleg has four figures , the latter extremity has the five fingers.
sentences.cn: 猫的前肢有四指, 后肢有五指.

sentences.en: Foreleg Wei 7 years, and now still swollen!
sentences.cn: 7年前脚崴了, 现在还有点肿! 详情见下文.

sentences.en: In a proper depiction the hindleg would be forward too, having moved before the foreleg.
sentences.cn: 正确的姿势应是，右后腿早应向前迈，并且应该在跨出前腿之前就迈出后腿。

sentences.en: Our horse had to be humanely destroyed after breaking his right foreleg.
sentences.cn: 我们的马摔断了右前腿，只好对它实行安乐死。

sentences.en: She gently placed a tourniquet 22 around my foreleg as a tear ran down her cheek.
sentences.cn: 她温柔地给我的前腿绑上了止血带,一滴泪珠从她的脸颊滑落.

sentences.en: The researchers found, for example, that a skeleton of a dog at a Finnish museum depicts the right hindleg in a rearward position while the right foreleg is lifted and moving forward.
sentences.cn: 例如，研究人员发现在一家芬兰博物馆中的一副狗的骨架，其右前腿已经离地向前而其右后腿仍在后方。

sentences.en: The steps are counted as foreleg moves back.
sentences.cn: 后退的步数是按照前脚往后移的次数计算.

sentences.en: The wing of a bat and the foreleg of a mouse are homologous.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠的翅膀和鼠的前腿是同源的.

sentences.en: They walk this way: the left hind leg moves forward, followed by the left foreleg, right hind leg and right foreleg, in order.
sentences.cn: 它们走路时左后腿先前迈，紧接着是左前腿、右后退、右前腿，依此顺序。

trans.tran_en: one of the two front legs of an animal with four legs
